game.name: Helicopter Strike
game.description:
This time you have to fight in the sky not on the land! Take your seat in your plane and be prepared to fly it over the enemy territory while destroying their huge army in a Helicopter Strike! Your helicopter is equipped with lots of ammunition and weapons. Fly the chopper in deadly skies while dodging bullets that are coming your way in this brand new action game! Fight hard to destroy as many enemy units as you can to win through each mission in this top-down shooter.

Destroy the boss, rescue all survivors, and clear the screen from all the enemies to achieve the objective in this HTML5 shooting challenge! There is no need to bother in case if you fail in achieving your mission first. You can feel free to take a few attempts before you complete your mission in each level. Do not forget to grab the coins through which you can upgrade your chopper later. Also, keep your eyes on the power-ups that will be very useful to create your high score.

You can restore some of your HP, attract coins and crates, and double score from enemies. Hey boys! Some special weapons are also waiting for you to make your gameplay pretty interesting and challenging. Shoot your enemies through short-range, high-damage flames, laser beams, a black hole, and high-damage missiles! Choose your helicopter, pick up the reliable weapon upgrades and shoot your every enemy to complete your objective!
